trans-unit.source: Represents a button on the ribbon that displays a drop-down menu when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 代表功能區顯示時按下下拉式選單上的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of RibbonMenuButton controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images.

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
